main_definition: Comprehensive, thorough, or extensive in nature; providing a lot of specific information or description.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving many precise details and facts
meanings_and_examples.example: The report provided a detailed analysis of the market trends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Taking much time in explaining or discussing something thoroughly
meanings_and_examples.example: She gave a detailed account of her day, recounting every event and interaction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Descriptive, including many specifics and particulars
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist created a detailed painting with intricate brush strokes and vivid colors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Characterized by small-scale features or elements that are closely observed
meanings_and_examples.example: He wore a detailed suit, complete with pocket squares and cufflinks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to an examination or analysis of the parts as opposed to the whole
meanings_and_examples.example: The mechanic conducted a detailed inspection of each component in the engine before diagnosing the issue.
